definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: Objective To observe the normal morphology of axons in brainstem .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察脑干组织中神经轴突的正常形态。

sentences.english: After nerve injury, the nerve function can be compensated by axonal plasticity .
sentences.chinese: 脑外伤后神经损伤可通过轴突的可塑性来代偿其功能。

sentences.english: KBP may promote regeneration of optic nerve axon after injury.
sentences.chinese: KBP在视神经损伤后可能促进了视神经的轴突再生。

sentences.english: Stained in black are the fiber-like extensions of the nerve cells, called axons.
sentences.chinese: 黑色部分为神经细胞的扩展纤维称为神经轴突。

sentences.english: Nucleus neurons in the part of core area were stellate-shaped, round nucleus and more axons.
sentences.chinese: 核心区细胞呈星芒状，轴突向周围伸展，核圆形。

sentences.english: Tensile stress for 6 hours resulted in reduction of spinal cord cells and loss of neurites.
sentences.chinese: 张应力作用6小时导致脊髓细胞的减少和轴突的丢失。

sentences.english: Some central neurons project to two or more target nuclei via their branched axons.
sentences.chinese: 某些中枢神经元通过分叉轴突向两个以上核团投射。

sentences.english: Results The density of retraction ball (RB) in the basal portion of the pons and superior cerebellar peduncle was the highest.
sentences.chinese: 结果轴突回缩球密度在桥脑基底部和小脑上脚最高。

sentences.english: In addition, axonal membrane damage was assessed by a horseradish peroxidase (HRP) exclusion assay.
sentences.chinese: 另外，轴突膜损伤有测定HRP的排斥来获得。

sentences.english: The axon then continues to grow, towed by an amoeboid structure at its tip.
sentences.chinese: 轴突前端有变形虫般的构造，会牵引轴突往前生长。

sentences.english: The axon then continues to grow, towed by an amoeboid structure at its tip.
sentences.chinese: 轴突前端有变形虫般的构造，会牵引轴突往前生长。

sentences.english: The line they form during proliferation conducts the growth of axons.
sentences.chinese: 它的增殖能形成索带，引导轴突生长。

sentences.english: And axon will extension with the regulation of those factors.
sentences.chinese: 神经轴突的生长就是在多种因子的调节下向前延伸。

sentences.english: No regenerated axon appeared by argentaffin staining, either.
sentences.chinese: 嗜银染色未见再生轴突。

sentences.english: The electrophysiologic and pathologic findings indicate a pattern of axonal loss that predominantly affects large-caliber myelinated fibers.
sentences.chinese: 电生理和病理结果显示轴突丢失主要累及粗有髓纤维。

sentences.english: Administration of brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) with the graft promoted modest axonal growth from grafted cells.
sentences.chinese: 联合使用BDNF能够适度促进移植细胞的轴突生长。

definition: myelin sheath (membrane surrounding axon of nerve cell)

pinyin: shen2 jing1 jiao1 zhi4 xi4 bao1

definition: axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)
neuron/also written 神經元|神经元
